
______________________________________________________________________________________________________
These command for downloading winodows in your droplets(VPS)


Use this command to install = wget -O- https://www.dropbox.com/s/bolrddmasyrpf2o/Windows11byronit.gz?dl=1 | gunzip | dd of=/dev/vda

alternative download command = wget -O- https://ia801504.us.archive.org/34/items/windows-11byronit/Windows11byronit.gz | gunzip | dd of=/dev/vda

There're two download command, if each doesn't work you can use alternative one.
